unit.name: Ruinous Dictator
unit.description: single model, One of a Kind, Height Gigantic, Type Infantry, Base 75x75 mm, Callous, Fearless, Stubborn, Supernal, Unlimited Power!, Wizard Adept, Aegis (5+), Halberd

unit.name: Vermin Senator
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, The Die is Cast, Valorous Discretion, Light Armour, Pistol (5+)

unit.name: Bloodfur Legate
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Valorous Discretion, Heavy Armour

unit.name: House Prefect
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Valorous Discretion, Light Armour

unit.name: Swarm Priest
unit.description: single model, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Valorous Discretion, Wizard Apprentice

unit.name: Duskblade Assassin
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Dark Doorways, Disdain for Plebs, Not a Leader, Sic Semper Tyrannis, Valorous Discretion, Distracting, Divine Attacks, Multiple Wounds (2, against Character), Paired Weapons, Throwing Weapons (2+)

unit.name: Vermin Velites
unit.description: 15-25 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Life is Cheap, Scoring, Light Armour, Cohort Coordination, Paired Weapons

unit.name: Vermin Legionaries
unit.description: 25-60 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Life is Cheap, Scoring, Light Armour, Cohort Coordination

unit.name: Blackfur Veterans
unit.description: 25-50 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Avrasi Formations, Callous, Life is Cheap, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Shield, Cohort Coordination, Halberd

unit.name: Vermin Slaves
unit.description: 30-80 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Insignificant, Life is Cheap

unit.name: Shadowfur Stalkers
unit.description: 10-20 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Life is Cheap, Light Troops, Sicarran Smugglers, Skirmisher, Hard Target (1), Paired Weapons

unit.name: Plague Disciples
unit.description: 20-40 models, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Bodyguard (Sacred Platform), Callous, Fear no Evil, Life is Cheap, Scoring, Cult of Errahman

unit.name: Giant Rats
unit.description: 10-30 models, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Beast, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Insignificant, Life is Cheap, Devastating Charge (+1 Att)

unit.name: Fetthis Brutes
unit.description: 6-15 models, 0-30 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Callous, Scoring, Fight in Extra Rank

unit.name: Murmillo Brutes
unit.description: 4-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 50x50 mm, Callous, Scoring, Heavy Armour, Quick to Fire

unit.name: Legionary Drill Team
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Back to the Burrows, Borne into Battle (Vermin Legionaries, Vermin Velites), Callous, Life is Cheap, War Platform, Grind Attacks (D3+1)

unit.name: Ignifier Grenadiers
unit.description: 8-15 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 20x20 mm, Callous, Life is Cheap, Light Troops, Skirmisher, Flammable, Hard Target (1), Heavy Armour, Deepfire Grenades (5+)

unit.name: Experimental Weapon Teams
unit.description: 3-6 models, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 25x50 mm, Callous, Life is Cheap, Light Troops, Heavy Armour, Heavy Weapon, Quick to Fire

unit.name: Doomspark Devices
unit.description: 1-3 models, 0-3 Models/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Callous, Swiftstride, Chassis: Chain Lightning, Grind Attacks (D6), Inanimate, Darkstone Generator

unit.name: Vermin Artillery
unit.description: single model, 0-4 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 75 mm round, Callous, War Machine, Move or Fire

unit.name: Stygian Earthbreaker
unit.description: single model, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Callous, Earthbreaker Drill, Strider, Stubborn, Underground Arrival, Devastating Charge (Fear), Grind Attacks (2D3), Impact Hits (2D3)

unit.name: Dreadmill Chariots
unit.description: 1-3 models, 0-2 Units/Army, Height Large, Type Construct, Base 50x100 mm, Callous, Light Troops, Swiftstride, Unstable Engines, Flammable, Chassis: Grind Attacks (1), Impact Hits (D6+1), Inanimate

unit.name: Arena Beast
unit.description: single model, 0-3 Units/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Beast, Base 50x100 mm, Callous, Fearless, Fortitude (5+), Arena Beast: Harnessed, Pitmaster: Halberd

mount.name: Praetorian Palanquin
mount.description: 0-3 Mounts/Army, Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Praetorian Brute
mount.description: Height Large, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Harnessed

mount.name: Triumphal Platform
mount.description: Height Gigantic, Type Construct, Base 80x80 mm, Borne into Battle (Blackfur Veterans, Fetthis Brutes, Vermin Legionaries), War Platform, Praetorian Brute (3): Harnessed, Chassis: Impact Hits (D6), Inanimate

mount.name: Sacred Platform
mount.description: 0-2 Mounts/Army, Height Gigantic, Type Construct, Base 60x100 mm, War Platform, Aegis (5+), Chassis: Impact Hits (D3), Harnessed

mount.name: Senatorial Litter
mount.description: Height Standard, Type Infantry, Base 40x40 mm, Tall, Vox Populi, Cannot be Stomped, Harnessed

item.name: Tunnel Markers
item.description: Each Vermin Swarm army gains one Tunnel Marker and can gain additional Tunnel Markers by including certain units in the Army List. At the start of step 7 of the Pre-Game Sequence (Spell Selection), for each of your armys Tunnel Markers, mark a point inside your half of the Battlefield with a Tunnel Marker. A player can only use up to 4 Tunnel Markers.

item.name: Tunnel Reserve
item.description: Certain units have the ability to either enter or start the game in Tunnel Reserve. Units in Tunnel Reserve follow the rules for Ambush, with the following differences: - Instead of entering the Battlefield from a Board Edge, the owner chooses a friendly Tunnel Marker. Place the unit within 3" of the centre of this marker. No model can be placed with its centre farther away from the centre of the chosen marker than its March Rate. If this is not possible for any friendly marker on the Battlefield, the unit cannot enter the Battlefield during this Player Turn. Roll again in the next friendly Player Turn. - A unit that enters the Battlefield from Tunnel Reserve cannot perform any Advance Moves, March Moves, or Reforms in the same Movement Phase. The unit counts as having performed a March Move for the purpose of shooting. - A unit that enters the Battlefield from Tunnel Reserve in Game Turn 5 or 6 loses Scoring. - A unit that enters Tunnel Reserve and does not return to the Battlefield before the end of the game counts as destroyed.

item.name: Borne into Battle
Borne into Battle (X)
item.description: The model must be deployed in, and can only join, a unit that includes at least one model from one of the unit entries stated in brackets (X). The model can never voluntarily leave its unit.

item.name: Callous
item.description: Health Point losses of the model that are caused by friendly models are ignored for Panic (including units destroyed due to attacks from friendly models). The model may use Shooting Attacks against enemy units Engaged in Combat, with the following rules and restrictions: - The enemy unit is Engaged only with friendly models that are of Standard Height and/or Infantry. - Friendly units Engaged in this Combat are ignored for Cover purposes (but not for drawing Line of Sight). - Roll to hit as normal against the intended target. Each hit from attacks without Area Attack must then be randomised to determine which unit is hit by rolling a D6 for each hit. On a roll of 4+, unless specifically stated otherwise, the intended target is hit; otherwise, the friendly unit Engaged with the intended target is hit. If there is more than one friendly unit, randomise which one is hit. - In case of Area Attacks, the initial hit is not randomised. Determine the number of hits caused by the Area Attack based on the attacks initial target. Then randomise each hit as specified above. - In case of a Flamethrower attack, roll the D6 to determine if the Flamethrower Misfires as usual. If it doesnt, determine the number of hits based on the initial target. Then randomise each hit as specified above.

item.name: Eagle Standard
Battle Standard Bearer with Eagle Standard
Standard Bearer with Eagle Standard
item.description: While a non-Fleeing unit with one or more Eagle Standards is within range of its Generals Commanding Presence, the unit gains Rally Around the Flag with the following rules and exceptions: - Its range is always 6". - DisciplineTests taken by units while within range of one or more instances of this Rally Around the Flag are subject to Minimised Roll.

item.name: Life is Cheap
item.description: When calculating Combat Score, halve the number of Health Point losses of models with Life is Cheap, rounding fractions up. This does not include Combat Score bonuses from Overkill.

item.name: Valorous Discretion
item.description: Single model units of Standard Height with Valorous Discretion treat all enemy units as units with Terror.

item.name: Without Number
item.description: If this option is taken for any model in the army, then all models in the army that can take it must take it. When the model is removed as a casualty, place it in a Reinforcement Pool next to the Battlefield. At any time, you may remove 40 models from this Reinforcement Pool and place one of the following Summoned units in Tunnel Reserve: - 25 Vermin Legionaries with a Champion, a Musician, a Standard Bearer with Eagle Standard, and Without Number. The unit loses Scoring. The unit may take Shield and Spear. - 40 Vermin Slaves with a Musician and Without Number.

item.name: Cohort Coordination
item.description: The model gains two instances of Fight in Extra Rank while its unit is Steadfast and does not suffer from Disrupted Ranks. Check if the conditions are met and apply the effects at the start of each Initiative Step.

item.name: Lightning Attacks
item.description: Close Combat, Shooting. The attacks become Magical Attacks, their Strength is set to D6, and their Armour Penetration is set to 2. If the targets unit is in contact with Water Terrain, failed to-wound rolls must be rerolled. Roll only once for the Strength value of all simultaneous hits with Lightning Attacks from a single unit and apply the result to all hits.

item.name: Mishap
Mishap (X)
item.description: The model suffers a Mishap when it rolls a natural 1 for the type of roll described in brackets (X). If X is “Misfire", the model suffers a Mishap instead of suffering effects from Misfire. A roll resulting in a Mishap can never be rerolled and an attack resulting in a Mishap is always lost. When suffering a Mishap, the models unit suffers 2 hits with Strength 5 and Armour Penetration 10. If the Trial and Terror shooting mode was used, the number of hits is increased to 4.

item.name: Trial and Terror
item.description: The Trial and Error section in a weapons profile describes an alternative shooting mode. If one model uses the Trial and Terror shooting mode, then all models in its unit must use it. The effects last until the end of the phase.

item.name: Cult of Errahman
item.description: Whenever a natural 1 is rolled to hit for a Close Combat Attack allocated towards a model with Cult of Errahman, the model part inflicts 1 hit with Toxic Attacks against the attacking models unit in the same Initiative Step, before any casualties are removed. R&F models with Cult of Errahman cannot be joined by models without Cult of Errahman. ASR

item.name: Jezail
Jezail (3+)
Jezail (4+) and Shield
item.description: Shooting Weapon. 0-18 Models/Army. Range 36", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 3, Accurate, Mishap (To-hit roll), Unwieldy. The bearer loses Quick to Fire if it had it (and cannot gain it in any way). Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to 24" and it gains Multiple Wounds (2) and Reload!.

item.name: Rotary Gun
Rotary Gun (3+)
Rotary Gun (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. 0-12 Models/Army. Range 18", Shots D6, Str 4, AP 2, Mishap (Roll for number of Shots). Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to Range 12", its Shots are set to D6x2, and it gains Reload!.

item.name: Canister Launcher
Canister Launcher (3+)
Canister Launcher (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. 0-9 Models/Army. Catapult (2x2). Range 24", Mishap (Misfire), Toxic Attacks. The total number of simultaneous hits from a unit with this weapon cannot exceed the number of models in the target unit. Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to Range 18". Replace Catapult (2x2) with Catapult (3x3).

item.name: Deepfire Thrower
item.description: Artillery Weapon. 0-9 Models/Army. Flamethrower. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Mishap (Misfire). The bearer gains Flammable. The total number of simultaneous hits from a unit with this weapon cannot exceed the number of models in the target unit. Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to 12" and its Strength is set to 4.

item.name: Secrets of the Doom Blade
item.description: Standard Height models only. Enchantment: Hand Weapon. While using this weapon, the wielder gains +1 Attack Value. Attacks made with this weapon gain Multiple Wounds (D6), become Divine Attacks and Magical Attacks, and their Strength and Armour Penetration are set to 10. It suffers 1 hit with Lightning Attacks.

item.name: Swarm Master
item.description: Enchantment: Close Combat Weapon. While using this weapon, the wielder gains Grind Attacks (X), where X is the number of Full Ranks in the wielders unit, up to a maximum of 10. These Grind Attacks are resolved with Strength 3, Armour Penetration 1, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Rodentium Bullets
item.description: Enchantment: Pistol. The weapons range is set to 18". The weapon gains +2 Shots, +1 AP, Accurate, and Magical Attacks.

item.name: Plague-Hermits Blessing
item.description: Models with Cult of Errahman only. Enchantment: Light Armour. The wearer gains +1 Health Point and Fortitude (5+). Successful to-hit rolls with Close Combat Attacks against the wearer must be rerolled.

item.name: Banner of the Last Storm
item.description: Cannot be taken by models that count towards Core. Parts of Terrain Features (including Open Terrain) that are within 18" of the bearers model are Dangerous Terrain (2) for models making a Flying Movement.

item.name: Sacred Aquila
item.description: The bearer and R&F models in the bearers unit gain Battle Focus. Additionally, for each natural to-hit roll of 1 with a Close Combat Attack made by the bearers unit, the bearers unit suffers 1 hit with Strength 3 and Armour Penetration 0 in the same Initiative Step. This is considered a Special Attack.

item.name: Bell of the Deep Roads
item.description: The bearers unit may start the game in Tunnel Reserve. Ambush rolls of the bearers unit may be rerolled. This overrides the restriction of Special Items not working while their bearer is off the board. If the unit passes an Ambush roll, all subsequent failed Ambush rolls for Tunnel Reserve during this Player Turn may be rerolled. Any unit that passes its Ambush roll due to this reroll must enter the Battlefield from the same Tunnel Marker as the bearers unit. If this is not possible, the unit cannot enter the Battlefield during this Player Turn. Roll again in the next friendly Player Turn.

item.name: Crown of Hubris
item.description: Dominant. Wizards only. Immediately after Siphon the Veil, i.e. after converting Veil Tokens into Magic Dice, the bearer may choose to inflict D6 hits against its unit that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. These hits are considered Special Attacks. If so, the owner gains additional Veil Tokens equal to half the number of lost Health Points, rounding fractions up.

item.name: Orb of Ateus
item.description: Vermin Senators and Rakachit Technocrats only. Once per Shooting Phase, the bearer may discard 2 Veil Tokens from its owners Veil Token pool and nominate a unit within 6" that has not fired yet during this Shooting Phase. Weapons with Trial and Terror in this unit gain +1 to wound and Magical Attacks, and the number of hits from each Mishap is increased by 3. The effects last until the end of the phase.

item.name: Orators Toga
item.description: Standard Height models only. The bearer gains Stand Behind and cannot issue Duels.

item.name: Storm Rocket
item.description: Vermin Senators and Skorchit Alchemists only. One use only. When this Artefact is used, it is a Shooting Weapon with Aim (2+) and the following profile: Range 24", Shots 1, Str 5, AP 2, Area Attack (3x3), Magical Attacks. On a natural to-hit roll of 1, the wielder suffers 1 hit with Lightning Attacks.

item.name: Map of the Deeps
item.description: Vermin Senators and Stygian Overseers only. At the end of each friendly Shooting Phase, the bearer may move a single friendly Tunnel Marker within 24" up to 6" in any direction.

item.name: Tome of the Ratking
item.description: The bearer can cast The Awakened Swarm (Hereditary Spell) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). At the end of each friendly Magic Phase, the bearer may discard up to 3 Veil Tokens. For each discarded Veil Token, Raise 3 Health Points in a friendly Rat Swarms unit. This can Raise Health Points above the units starting size, up to a maximum of 27 Health Points.

item.name: Tarinas Lyre
item.description: Vermin Senators and Fetthis Fleshmasters only. Stomp Attacks made by enemy units within 6" of the bearer suffer a −2 to-wound modifier.

item.name: Battered Laurel Wreaths
item.description: Vermin Senators only. When an enemy model issues a Duel that the bearer could accept, and if the bearers unit does have the option of upgrading a model to a Champion but does not contain a Champion, then the bearer may upgrade a single non-Command Group R&F model in its unit to a Champion. This Champion must accept the Duel that was just issued. If that Champion has not been removed as a casualty when the Duel ends, it is degraded to a non-Command Group R&F model.

item.name: Unlimited Power!
item.description: Universal Rule. The model must be the General. While within range of the models Commanding Presence, other friendly units gain Unstable and cannot voluntarily choose Flee as a Charge Reaction.

item.name: I am the Senate
item.description: Universal Rule. When friendly units within range of the models Commanding Presence (including the model itself) lose Health Points due to Unstable, the number of lost Health Points is reduced by the units number of Full Ranks, to a maximum of 3.

item.name: Lord of the Legions
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Great Weapon and Paired Weapons.

item.name: Pontifex Maximus
item.description: The model knows The Awakened Swarm (Hereditary Spell) in addition to its other spells. In addition, the model always selects its spells from all Learned Spells of its chosen Path.

item.name: Avatar of Acratos
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Lightning Reflexes and adds +2 to its sides Combat Score in combats which it is Engaged in when Combat Scores are calculated.

item.name: Avatar of Favana
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Multiple Wounds (D3) and Swiftstride.

item.name: Avatar of Udius
item.description: The model gains Fortitude (4+, against non-Magical Melee Attacks).

item.name: Vox Populi
item.description: Universal Rule. The range of the models Commanding Presence is set to 18" when measured to units with one or more models with Eagle Standard.

item.name: Pestilent Pulpit
Sacred Platform: Pestilent Pulpit
Sacred Platform: Pestilent Pulpit
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can cast Breath of Corruption (Occultism) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). The model gains Borne into Battle (Plague Disciples). The models unit gains Poison Attacks with the following exceptions: - Only models with Cult of Errahman are affected. - Close Combat Attacks that already were Poison Attacks from another source will automatically wound on successful to-hit rolls of 5+ instead of 6+.

item.name: Whispering Bell
Sacred Platform: Whispering Bell
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can cast Speaking in Tongues (Thaumaturgy) as a Bound Spell with Power Level (4/8). The model gains Borne into Battle (Blackfur Veterans, Vermin Legionaries), Channel (1), and Musician. The range of the models March to the Beat, and to enemy units that are required to take a March Test due to the models unit, are both extended to 18". Friendly units within 12" of the Sacred Platform gain Aegis (6+).

item.name: Decimation
item.description: Universal Rule. When the models unit fails a Discipline Test after any rerolls, you may apply the following rules: 1. Roll a D6. 2. Add the result to the initial dice rolled for the Discipline Test as an (additional) instance of Minimised Roll, ignoring all dice that were discarded from any other instances of Minimised Roll. 3. The models unit suffers a number of hits equal to the discarded from this instance of Minimised Roll that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed.

item.name: Fetthis Fleshmaster
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Heavy Armour and Shield. Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase of units consisting entirely of Giant Rats, Fetthis Brutes, Arena Beasts, and models on Praetorian Brute within 12" are subject to Maximised Roll.

item.name: Rakachit Technocrat
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Engineer (3+) that can also be used on Experimental Weapon Teams, affecting all Experimental Weapon Team models in the chosen unit.

item.name: Skorchit Alchemist
item.description: Universal Rule. One use only. May be activated at the start of any Round of Combat. Standard Height R&F models in the models unit gain Lightning Reflexes until the end of the Player Turn. The unit suffers D6 hits that wound automatically with no saves of any kind allowed. These hits are considered Special Attacks.

item.name: Stygian Overseer
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Heavy Armour and Great Weapon. At the start of any friendly Shooting Phase, a single model with Stygian Overseer may detonate a single Tunnel Marker within 24" of it. If so, all units within 6" of the Tunnel Marker suffer 2D6 hits with Strength 4 and Armour Penetration 1. Then remove the Tunnel Marker.

item.name: Caelysian Pantheon
item.description: Universal Rule. The models Path access is replaced with: Thaumaturgy, Witchcraft

item.name: Holy Triumvirate
item.description: Universal Rule. If there are at least 3 models with Holy Triumvirate on your Army List, and they all have either Caelysian Pantheon or they all have Cult of Errahman, these models can all select spells as follows: - Wizard Apprentices select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, and 4 of their chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell. - Wizard Adepts select from the Learned Spells 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, and 6 of their chosen Path and the Hereditary Spell.

item.name: Dark Doorways
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot be deployed during the Deployment Phase. Instead, at the start of any Player Turn, the owner may choose a friendly unit of Vermin Velites, Vermin Legionaries, Blackfur Veterans, Shadowfur Stalkers, or Ignifier Grenadiers that is not Fleeing and that the model can join, and apply the following rules: - Remove a R&F model from the chosen units first rank as a casualty. You cannot remove the last R&F model from a unit. - Deploy the Duskblade Assassin inside the unit in the position of the removed model. - The Duskblade Assassin cannot voluntarily leave its unit during the Player Turn in which it was deployed. - If the model is not deployed by the end of Game Turn 4, it counts as a casualty and cannot be deployed for the rest of the game. - The model cannot be deployed in a Summoned unit.

item.name: Disdain for Plebs
item.description: Universal Rule. The model cannot be chosen by the opponent as the model that suffers the penalties for refusing a Duel.

item.name: Sic Semper Tyrannis
item.description: Universal Rule. While the models unit is in base contact with one or more enemy Characters, the model gains +1 Attack Value for each other Duskblade Assassin in the same unit.

item.name: Sling
Sling (4+)
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 18", Shots 1, Str 3, AP 0. The attack gains +1 Strength when shooting from Short Range.

item.name: Bloodfur Praetorians
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Bodyguard (Vermin Senator that is the General) and Great Weapon, and loses Halberd.

item.name: Avrasi Formations
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains the following rules based on its units Formation: - Testudo: While the models unit is in Close Formation, the model gains +1 Armour against Shooting Attacks. - Phalanx: While the models unit is in Line Formation, the model must reroll natural to- wound rolls of 1 with its Close Combat Attacks.

item.name: Tunnelling Tools
item.description: Universal Rule. The unit adds a single Tunnel Marker to the army.

item.name: Sicarran Smugglers
item.description: Universal Rule. The unit may start the game in Tunnel Reserve. Ambush rolls of units consisting entirely of models with Sicarran Smugglers may be rerolled.

item.name: Bloodpox Blades
Acolytes Bloodpox Blades
item.description: Close Combat Weapon. Paired Weapons. Attacks made with Bloodpox Blades gain Poison Attacks.

item.name: Fear no Evil
item.description: Universal Rule. While the models unit is Steadfast and does not suffer from Disrupted Ranks, it gains Unbreakable. In addition, while in the same unit as a Swarm Priest, the model gains Fearless.

item.name: Dire Rats
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +1 Strength, +1 Armour Penetration, and +1 Resilience, and its base size is changed to 25x50 mm. The model loses Insignificant.

item.name: Back to the Burrows
item.description: Universal Rule. Once per game, at the end of the owners Movement Phase, the models unit may be removed from the Battlefield and placed in Tunnel Reserve. Before the unit is removed, it loses Scoring until it returns to the Battlefield. This can only be done if the models unit is not Engaged or Shaken and has 50 or fewer Health Points.

item.name: Deepfire Grenades
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 8", Shots 2, Str 6, AP 2, Accurate, Flaming Attacks, Quick to Fire, Volley Fire.

item.name: Chain Lightning
item.description: Special Attack. The models Grind Attacks are resolved as Lightning Attacks

item.name: Darkstone Generator
item.description: Shooting Weapon. Range 12′′, Shots D6, Lightning Attacks, March and Shoot, Mishap (Roll for number of Shots), Reload!. The attacks hit automatically. Trial and Terror: The weapon instead targets and automatically hits all units within 6′′ (including units not inside the Front Arc/Line of Sight, and units Engaged in Combat) except the shooting unit itself (remember that models that are Engaged in Combat cannot perform Shooting Attacks). Roll once for the number of shots and apply this value to all targeted units, then roll for the Strength of the hits for each targeted unit individually. These shots are not randomised using the rules for Callous.

item.name: Rakachit Mauss Rifle
Rakachit Mauss Rifle (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Range 48", Shots 1, Str 5 [7], AP 2 [4], Area Attack(1x5), Mishap (To-hit roll), [Multiple Wounds (D3)]. Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to 24", and it gains Accurate and [Multiple Wounds (D6)].

item.name: Skorchit Ordnance
Skorchit Ordnance (4+)
item.description: Artillery Weapon. Catapult (4x4). Range 12-48", Shots 1, Str 4, AP 0, Flaming Attacks, Mishap (Misfire). The model gains Flammable. Trial and Terror: The weapons range is set to 12-30". Replace Catapult (4x4) with Catapult (6x6).

item.name: Earthbreaker Drill
item.description: Universal Rule. The model can only perform its Grind Attacks against units Engaged with its Front Facing. The model gains +3 Armour against: - Shooting Attacks from enemy models Located in the models Front Arc. - Melee Attacks from units Engaged with the models Front Facing.

item.name: Underground Arrival
item.description: Universal Rule. The model adds one Tunnel Marker to the army. In addition, the model may choose to start the game in Tunnel Reserve. Once per game, at the end of the owners Movement Phase, the models unit may be removed from the Battlefield and placed in the Tunnel Reserve. This cannot be done if the model is Engaged or Shaken.

item.name: Unstable Engines
item.description: Universal Rule. Units consisting entirely of models with Unstable Engines: - Gain +D6" to their Charge Range rolls in the Charge Phase. Also add this D6 to the Failed Charge distance. - Immediately after choosing to perform a March Move, gain +D6" March Rate. The effects last until the end of the phase. Immediately before a model is removed as a casualty from the unit, the model inflicts D6 hits with Strength 4, Armour Penetration 0 and Flaming Attacks against all units (including the models unit) within 6" of the model. Roll once for the number of hits inflicted against each unit. These hits are considered Special Attacks.

item.name: Underworld Beast
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains Random Movement (3D6") and its Attack Value is set to 4D3. It loses Harnessed and the Pitmaster model part, and its base size is changed to 60x100 mm.

item.name: Cowl of the Apostate
item.description: The model gains Holy Triumvirate (see Swarm Priest), and for the purpose of this rule, it counts as having both Caelysian Pantheon and Cult of Errahman.

item.name: Endless Tide
item.description: Universal Rule. Rat Swarms cannot declare any Charges and always count as Fleeing when Charged (i.e. they must Flee as a Charge Reaction if able to, are destroyed if Pursued into, etc.). They cannot benefit from Commanding Presence. A Rat Swarms unit can make a Sweeping Attack against a single unengaged enemy unit when passing within 1" (it does not need to and cannot move through or over that unit). The enemy unit suffers 1 hit for each Health Point in the Rat Swarms unit with Strength 2 and Armour Penetration 1. If the enemy unit is Engaged in Combat, then randomise the hits as per the Callous rules. If another unit (friend or foe) comes into base contact with a Rat Swarms unit, then the Rat Swarms unit immediately, before completing the move that led to the base contact, performs its Sweeping Attack against that unit. If two units simultaneously come into base contact with the Rat Swarms unit, the owner of the Rat Swarms unit chooses which unit suffers the Sweeping Attack. The Rat Swarms unit is then immediately removed as a casualty.

item.name: The Die is Cast
item.description: Universal Rule. The model gains +1 Discipline, up to a maximum of 8, while within 12" of one or more enemy models.

item.name: Greater Eagle Standard
item.description: Universal Rule. The bearer gains Standard Bearer and Eagle Standard, with the exception that the requirement for being within range of its Generals Commanding Presence is ignored.

item.name: Heavy Weapon
item.description: Attack Attribute - Shooting. The model may not use its Shooting Weapon if the model performed a March Move in this Player Turn.

rule.name: VS#8
rule.leftTerm: Battle Standard Bearer with Eagle Standard
